body: Happy Valentines Day. Hopefully you have a valentine and are going to tell them! I, personally have no crushes or what so ever, or irl friends, only my internet friends who probs smoke and deal drugs irl(jk). so good luck to you all!

title: Happy Valentines Day !

Happy Valentines day
Enjoy your kinships, friendships and relationships!!!

replies.body:
Happy Valentine's day to you too Rattle! 
And just because you say you don't have any crushes or irl friends, you can still do random acts of love today. That's what I'm going to be doing. I'm also going to take my mom some balloons and flowers to her work and surprise her!

replies.body: Happy Valentine's Day! Even if I don't celebrate it, I hope that everyone who does has a great day!

Have a good day everyone! :)
